title: The Queen
creator_credit: BIM Distribuzione, Granada Film Productions, Scott Rudin Productions, Future Films, Pathé Pictures International, Pathé Renn Productions, Canal+, France 3 Cinéma, Consolata Boyle, Alan MacDonald, Andy Harries, Stephen Frears, Christine Langan, Peter Morgan and Tracey Seaward
headline_credit: France, Italy, United Kingdom and United States of America, 2006
brief_description: The Queen is an intimate behind the scenes glimpse at the interaction between HM Elizabeth II and Prime Minister Tony Blair during their struggle, following the death of Diana, to reach a compromise between what was a private tragedy for the Royal family and the public’s demand for an overt display of mourning.

constellations_other.name: Royalty, royalty, royalty
constellations_other.description: Fascination with the royal family has persisted over the years, as seen through newsreels, documentaries, films, TV shows, tabloid news and satire.
